thread.title: BRIEF-Cboe Global Markets Reports April 2018 Trading Volume

title: BRIEF-Cboe Global Markets Reports April 2018 Trading Volume
text:
May 4, 2018 / 6:37 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Cboe Global Markets Reports April 2018 Trading Volume Reuters Staff
Cboe Global Markets Inc: * CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS REPORTS APRIL 2018 TRADING VOLUME
* CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS INC - TOTAL OPTIONS VOLUME IN APRIL 2018 WAS 158.3 MILLION CONTRACTS, UP 15.9 PERCENT
* CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS INC - APRIL TOTAL FUTURES ADV 261,000 CONTRACTS, DOWN 13.4 PERCENT
* CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS INC - TOTAL OPTIONS ADV IN APRIL 2018 WAS 7.5 MILLION CONTRACTS, UP 4.8 PERCENT
* CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS - APRIL 2018 U.S. EQUITIES TOTAL VOLUME 28,208 MILLIONS SHARES, UP 16.8%
* CBOE GLOBAL MARKETS INC - APRIL TOTAL FUTURES VOLUME 5.5 MILLION CONTRACTS, DOWN 4.2 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
